byline.original: By GUIDO ENDERIS Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: German press speculation on German final attack
snippet: BERLIN, June 30--The second and "final" phase of the war in the West--the liquidation of Germany's war on Britain--is coming more actively within the range of German editorial speculation....

headline.main: BLOWS AT BRITAIN SURVEYED IN REICH; Berlin Speculation Includes Possibility of Ireland's Being Drawn Into WarNAVAL ACTION ANTICIPATEDGerman Commentator Pointsto Prospect of Decisive Fightin Strait of Dover

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, June 30--The second and "final" phase of the war in the West--the liquidation of Germany's war on Britain--is coming more actively within the range of German editorial speculation.
